title: Public webinar to highlight launch of Climate Mapping for Resilience and Adaptation (CMRA) Portal and Assessment Tool
content:
Climate Mapping for Resilience and Adaptation (CMRA) integrates information from across the federal government. Credit: CMRA
Climate Mapping for Resilience and Adaptation (CMRA) integrates information from across the federal government. Credit: CMRA
On Thursday, January 19, the Climate Mapping for Resilience and Adaptation (CMRA) Portal team will host a webinar demonstrating the CMRA Portal and Assessment Tool. This web-based tool, developed by Esri, is the result of a collaborative effort between the White House, NOAA, and the Department of the Interior.
CMRA helps communities recognize and document their exposure to climate-related hazards both present and future. The tool can help community organizations and federal, state, local, and tribal governments begin developing equitable climate resilience plans and making climate-smart investments.
